[Mythical Adra Stone](/mythicalAdraStone/) |body = Legendary Plate Armor (Deadfire){{!}}Legendary Plate Armor |grimoire = Sigilmaster Auranic's Grimoire |weapon1 = Legendary Wand (Deadfire){{!}}Legendary Wand |weapon1_offhand = Legendary Scepter (Deadfire){{!}}Legendary Scepter |internalname = CHA_RE_Deranged_Wizard |guid = 07a064d4-afff-4ce4-ab9e-732039b07af6 }} '''Sigilmaster Auranic''' is a character and mega boss in {{poe2}}. She is the third mega boss added to the game, in the update {{laxf3}}. ## Background {{Description|This traveler's guide is circulated for the benefit of newcomers to the Deadfire Archipelago. One passage stands out: "Sigilmaster Auranic is ON THE LOOSE. She was sentenced for planting DEADLY sigils in populated areas, and affected her escape with nothing more than a stone game piece and an inkwell. Trust in the authorities and make NO ATTEMPT to apprehend her. She will have flanked herself in sigils powerful enough to EXPLODE unwary visitors on the spot. The Deadfire Visitor's Preservation Society takes no responsibility for harm inflicted by knowing ignorance of the risks, and every effort has been made to keep travelers AWAY from the following coordinates: 4째 50' S 67째 31' E." A map of Auranic's position is marked off with a wax seal in the shape of a skull. It points toward an underwater cave far to the northeast.}} ## Encounters * [Briny Grotto](/brinyGrotto/) in [Ofecchia Channel](/ofecchiaChannel/) ## Notes * The obelisks surrounding the sigilmaster all have Globe of Invulnerability, which to no surprise makes them invulnerable to your attacks. Thankfully they cannot attack you or cast spells while in this state. In order to make them attack, the sigilmaster casts Sigil Assault on the obelisks, one at a time. This removes the invulnerability and allows the obelisks to attack for 172 seconds, during which they will repeatedly cast a specific ability. * Each of the sigilmaster's obelisks has the following stats: ** 60 All Defenses, 10 Base Armor, Immune to Slash and Piercing * Each of the obelisks casts the following spells (from the bottom left, clockwise) ** Obelisk of Wrath: [Chain Lightning](/chainLightning/), chained shock damage ** Obelisk of Terror: [Ryngrim's Enervating Terror](/ryngrimsEnervatingTerror/), [terrifying](/statusEffectsDeadfireAfflictions/) your party. ** Obelist of Mystery: Casts 5x [Tayn's Chaotic Orb](/taynsChaoticOrb/) repeatedly at 3.0 sec intervals. ** Obelisk of Force: Casts 5x [Minoletta's Minor Missiles](/minolettasMinorMissiles/) ** Obelisk of Cleansing: [Arcane Cleanse](/arcaneCleanse/), -1000 sec duration of beneficial effects. ## Gallery PE2_Sigilmaster Auranic.png | Cave interior
